rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description_light: This is a dimly lit windowless room. You are sitting on the edge of a bed. In the dull beam of the lamp hung on the wall you can see a door ajar with darkness extending behind it to the north and another closed door to the east.

rooms.name: Madman's Room
rooms.description_light: You have entered a room with a raving lunatic sat banging his head against the north wall. There is an additional exit visible in the gloom to the east. You're unsure whether you should risk making the madman aware of your presence or whether to sneak past him.

rooms.name: Dwarf's Cavern
rooms.description_light: You are in a small cavern. It turns out you're sharing it with an angry looking dwarf stood in the northeast corner. The dwarf is holding a wicked looking sledgehammer and staring at you menacingly. A confrontation seems unavoidable.

rooms.name: Room with Rushing Water
rooms.description_light: This is a room that is dominated by a rushing sound. Just as you're about to take your next step you notice that most of the floor is missing. You can see moving water underneath illuminated by your lamp.
rooms.description_dark: This is a room that is dominated by a rushing sound. You hesitantly take a step forwards, but where the floor should be your foot meets no resistance you stumble forward and fall through the large hole you didn't see in the dark. After what seems like a lifetime you plunge into the water and are swept away in its torrent.

rooms.name: Gallery Overlooking the Underground River
rooms.description_light: This is a wider space. A gallery of sorts. There is an opening on the west side and you can hear the sound of the river below. The only other exit is on the north end of the room.
rooms.description_dark: This is a wider space. You sense an opening to the east and hear a rushing sound from that side. There is a faint glow of light coming through an opening to the north.

rooms.name: Room with a Well
rooms.description_light: You're in a large room with what looks like a well in the northwest corner. There seems to be a ladder down the inside of the well. There are two further doors besides the one you came through; one to the east, and one to the south.

rooms.name: A larder
rooms.description_light: You are in a room with food piled from the floor to the rafters. Shelves and shelves of simple fare and the greatest of delicacies. Even just the smell is overwhelming after the hours spent in this under ground warren. There are no exits other than the one you came through.

rooms.name: North of a Snake Pit
rooms.description_light: This is the north edge of what appears to be a large pit. You hear a hissing from below but aren't sure what is causing it. In the distance you can just make out the opposite edge of the pit. There is a rope spanning the darkness.
rooms.description_dark: Walking through the dark you become aware of what seems like a faint hissing sound ahead of you. You slow down and take one tentative step after the other until suddenly your foot meets no resistance and you tumble into darkness.

rooms.name: Room with a Crumbling Wall
rooms.description_light: This is a simple room with exits to the north east and west. The south wall looks in pretty bad shape and may give way with the right kind of persuasion.

rooms.name: Boudoir
rooms.description_light: What hits you first is the smell. You are in a room that seems to consist of soft furniture, gauzy hangings, and candlelight. The heady aroma of perfume mixed with something more...primal permeates the air. You are not alone. Through one of the drapes you can see the a woman reclining on a bed smiling at you.
